name: 52 Pickup
description:
Do you like card games? Do you like collecting things? Well, this is the game for you!

Introducing the most original card game idea, 52 Card Pick Up! Inspired by games like Banjo Kazooie; collect cards, solve puzzles, and explore the world!

If you want an extra challenge, why not collect all the cards while racing against time?

Programmer: Simon Romero

Artist: Dannan Vazquez

Music: Davis Tourangeau

Please comment below on what you think on the game!
